comments:
I deployed BIRTViewerExample to WAS 5.1 as a WAR file and deployed a report that uses Java Event handlers. Everything worked fine only when I put the java handler classes in WEB-INF/classes folder. 
I created a scriptlib folder under ~installedApps\TCL02743\birt.ear\birt.war. TCL02743 is my machine name and birt is the application name.
I've set BIRT_VIEWER_SCRIPTLIB_DIR property in web.xml to point to the scriptlib folder. The server never found the Java classes. The behavior is the same with relative and absolute paths, and with and without server and application restart.

The same thing happens with BIRT_VIEWER_WORKING_FOLDER and BIRT_VIEWER_LOG_DIR parameters.
It looks to me that all these settings in web.xml file are ignored.

Thereafter is the related portion of a test version of my web.xml file:

<web-app id="WebApp_1159293076141">
      <display-name>Eclipse BIRT Report Viewer</display-name>
      <context-param id="ContextParam_1159293076141">
         <param-name>BIRT_VIEWER_LOCALE</param-name>
         <param-value>en-US</param-value>
      </context-param>
      <context-param id="ContextParam_1159293076142">
         <param-name>BIRT_VIEWER_WORKING_FOLDER</param-name>
         <param-value>C:\Program Files\WebSphere\AppServer\installedApps\TCL02743\birt.ear\birt.war\Reports</param-value>
      </context-param>
      <context-param id="ContextParam_1159293076143">
         <param-name>WORKING_FOLDER_ACCESS_ONLY</param-name>
         <param-value>false</param-value>
      </context-param>
      <context-param id="ContextParam_1159293076144">
         <param-name>BIRT_VIEWER_IMAGE_DIR</param-name>
         <param-value></param-value>
      </context-param>
      <context-param id="ContextParam_1159293076145">
         <param-name>BIRT_VIEWER_LOG_DIR</param-name>
         <param-value>C:\Program Files\WebSphere\AppServer\logs\server1</param-value>
      </context-param>
      <context-param id="ContextParam_1159293076146">
         <param-name>BIRT_VIEWER_LOG_LEVEL</param-name>
         <param-value>FINE</param-value>
      </context-param>
      <context-param id="ContextParam_1159293076147">
         <param-name>BIRT_VIEWER_SCRIPTLIB_DIR</param-name>
         <param-value>"C:\Program Files\WebSphere\AppServer\installedApps\TCL02743\birt.ear\birt.war\scriptlib"</param-value>
      </context-param>

The systemOut.log file shows the following outputs:

Could you please try the latest build again?
Can not reprodcue. Work well using birt 2.1.2 in Websphere 5.
